name: promptRUB Mask (Black)
detail:
The GQWhite ™ Mask is constructed with a liquid-repellent exterior fabric, and a Perma™ antibacterial interior. The mask is washable up to 30 times and comes with a secure fit head strap for a customizable fit.
Features:
- Liquid-repellent fabric mask
- Breathable
- Can be washed at least 30 times
- The outer fabric uses the same liquid-repellent technology from our GQWhite ™ shirt.
- Perma ™ inner fabric is soft, comfortable to wear and prevent bacteria growth 99.9%
- Adjustable strap creates a better fit for better protection
- 5 baht per day (Calculated from washing and reuse 30 times)
